metadata.synopsis: Flaming Fist guarding Baldur's Gate (the gate)

0.speaker: Fist Grassley
0.text: Join the queue or leave, citizen.
0.context: NodeContext: Irritated by the player still bothering her

1.speaker: Fist Grassley
1.text: If you're looking to get into the Upper City, you'll need to join the queue.
1.context: NodeContext: Matter of fact/weary - has clearly had to say this a lot today
